TopicTitle: Some joystick axis not detected, others are.

Articles.Content: I'm using a custom joystick made with an Arduino Leonardo. But wait! I'm pretty sure it's not causing the issue! When I open up windows game controller settings, I can see the troublesome axis (throttle) is being detected. I have also confirmed that it works in other games. However, it is not being detected within KSP. I have tried binding throttle to pitch, and it works just fine. When I try to bind throttle to the actual throttle, the game simply doesn't detect it. I've tried editing settings.cfg to the axis (axis 7) that the throttle shows up as in other programs, but it still doesn't work. Any help would be much appreciated. Thanks!

Not really a solution, but may help diagnosis and could serve as a band-aid.
